Question.Subject: what are mood messages in skype?
Question.Content: Can I not have them? Can I make it so only some people can see them? Can others see my mood history? Do I have to erase them? When I reply to someone's mood, people seem confused. Please explain!
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Try this website it might answer some of your questions.
https://support.skype.com/category/PROFILE__MOOD_MESSAGES/
https://support.skype.com/faq/FA594/What-are-mood-messages
Hope this helps
